item.title: Guide for Law Students: Understanding EU Law
item.description: Catherine Barnard, Trinity College, Cambridge* EU law is a captivating field of study that offers something for everyone, particularly those interested in politics, visionary thinking, and pragmatic solutions. Even if these aren’t your primary interests, it’s essential to study EU law due to its mandatory nature. However, it’s unlike any other legal system you may have encountered, defying categorization and fitting into no single box. Before diving in, it’s helpful to reflect on your existing political perspectives on the EU.
